CustomField.formula: TEXT( YEAR( $Setup.Bad_Debt_Summary_Report__c.End_Date__c ) ) & "-" & IF( MONTH( $Setup.Bad_Debt_Summary_Report__c.End_Date__c ) < 10, "0", "" ) & TEXT( MONTH( $Setup.Bad_Debt_Summary_Report__c.End_Date__c ) ) & "-" & IF( DAY( $Setup.Bad_Debt_Summary_Report__c.End_Date__c ) < 10, "0", "") & TEXT( DAY( $Setup.Bad_Debt_Summary_Report__c.End_Date__c ) )
CustomField.label: Conga Bad Debt Summary Rpt End Date
